messages.title: GREEN STRENGTH IN LEWISHAM
messages.content: Green councillors work constructively with others but hold Labour to account and get results for residents.

messages.title: Labour's rail chaos
messages.content: Labour has failed to stand up for passengers. Greens would keep the pressure on the failing rail companies to improve services or face losing their franchises.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Green councillors are pushing for a green recovery. We can build back better after Covid by investing in jobs that also tackle climate change.
Green councillors stand up to developers. We scrutinise planning applications to ensure new development brings maximum benefit to local communities.

issues.economy: We can build back better after Covid by investing in jobs that also tackle climate change.
issues.environment: Green councillors are pushing for a green recovery.
issues.governance: Green councillors work constructively with others but hold Labour to account and get results for residents.

housing.content: Green councillors stand up to developers. We scrutinise planning applications to ensure new development brings maximum benefit to local communities.

images.caption: Elect Darren and the Greens on May 6th
